Title: Read private customer data reclaiming carts in Klaviyo Magento
Description: A researcher identified an endpoint in a thirth party module Klaviyo Magento 2 which allows to read private customer data from stores. It works by reclaiming any guest-cart as your own and reading the private data for the orders in the Magento API.
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.0.0, all versions starting from 3.0.0
